ArtRoomFunction: ^"The home puts up these art therapy sessions you can go for, if thats your jam or whatever."
^"In general it's always open to mess with stuff, if you want."
^[Timothy] "They've got a lot of um.... stuff... in here."
^] "Yeah, they encourage people to get creative and express themselves."
^I'm not super good at expressing myself, so it just kind of stresses me out.
^It also tends to fatigue me more than usual. The tax for creativity, I guess.
^"But yeah, you wanna try something out?"
